Reviews.Title: Not 100% New
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: The original seal (black label) is torn, covered by fake-looking Samsung Do-Not-Accept-If-Seal-Is-Broken sticker. I paid about $30 more from Amazon vendor to make sure I really get brand new item. But I guess this is as good as it can be. Everything in it seems new. Hope it is at least factory refurb. Still better than the "BRAND NEW" s3 I bought from a reputable eBay seller. Had to return it.When I booted this phone up, instruction is in Mandarin. Need my Chinese friend's help to change it to English. I will update this review after I play with it a little bit and check if it is really unlocked. I gave 5 stars because this is an excellent phone. I like it better than iPhone 5 because of Android flexibility with the apps. I bought S2 in the past and can't wait to use this one. Do your research before buying, there are 2 models, I9300 & T999. Choose wisely. ^_^

Reviews.Title: Careful which carrier you are using
Reviews.Author: ELSC
Reviews.Content: There have been many good reviews of the phone. I will not review the phone but will agree with all others that this is one incredible phone. I will add that I received the UK version - it was printed on the box and instruction booklet. All stickers were intact - "Do not accept if seal broken" and manufacturer's seal. The phone also had all its plastic protectors intact, both on the screen and back of phone. Battery was in a taped plastic bag. A point to note is that the SIM card slot uses a push spring mechanism. So you need to push it till it clicks (spring catches). To release push in again and spring will push it out.OK, this is a GSM phone. If you intend to use it on CDMA carriers like Sprint, Verizon, etc. It will not work. Only GSM carriers like AT&T;, T-mobile will work. But a major point to note. For T-mobile their 4G runs on 1700 Mhz band, the phone runs HSPA+ (or 3G/4G) on 1900 Mhz. So if you are on T-mob your high speed internet connections may be spotty ... well, until T-mob refarms all their cell towers to 1900 band. For At&t; , no problems. You get HSPA+ (3G/4G) right away. Similar with Straighttalk prepaid, since they run on AT&T;'s network. We don't know what is T-mob's roadmap on their refarming. But if you want to know whether your area has 1900 coverage go to airportal.de .The phone is super fast when you are able to get on a high speed connection. This one's a quad core Exynos whereas the US version is a dual core Snapdragon.

Reviews.Title: Excelent purchase but on French.
Reviews.Author: Harold
Reviews.Content: The cel is excelent. The ítem was delivery on time, but It was on french. The cel and manuals was only on french. I could changed the language of the phone and I found the english manuals on the web, but the vendor specs should said that.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Arlin Pulgar
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung Glaxy S III. Is a phone that has multiple uses that have multiple functions and one of the best on the market. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Love this phone.
Reviews.Author: KDK
Reviews.Content: Product came quickly. It was  as described. This phone is amazing. It does everything. This is a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival..Can i give it a 0?
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Phone does not charge right out of the box. When I connect it to a wall outlet, the red charge light comes on for 2 seconds and then turns off. The phone never actually charges. Returning it.

Reviews.Title: it as good as its description and worth keeping it! Everything is amazing when I got this item.
Reviews.Author: Franciswp
Reviews.Content: it as good as its description and worth keeping it! Everything is amazing when I got this item. Only no satisfied thing is that the connection of charge is not work well, but for the low price, it worth to keep!

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Ximena V. Zuazo
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to fully use it but considering I am disabled and use my middle finger nuckle to manage it I have to say this the best celular phone I've ever had. The touch screen is as precise as it can be, not like the Iphone that it's screen is way to sensitive. I hardly have to as for help anymore to talk or text on this phone.

Reviews.Title: best possible
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: when I received the phone was described as such and which the seller was saying. came with his seal of guarantee (it was not broken) which gave me great hope because I knew it was a oem phone. brought all accessories and work best. 100% recommended

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: tywana
Reviews.Content: I bought a galaxy from buyer cell sell who said the phone were unblocked LIAR. I paid all this money for this phone just to spend more to get it unblock which he said were. I also had to changed my carrier who I been with for years because he sent my an Verizon phone. Please be mindful when making a purchase online everyone is not truthful just trying to get your money and you have to spend more. I wish I would have kept my insurance on my phone or just bought one of  the phone cricket had in their store it would have rounded out to the same price I spent.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone!
Reviews.Author: Muna
Reviews.Content: I got this phone a few months after it was released... All my friends envied me for it!  At first I was slightly concerned for its size, I have small hands and don't carry a purse, so I wasn't sure if it would be uncomfortable for me.  But I was very wrong.  The phone is very light, super smooth to the touch, and fits in the front pocket of every pants/jeans I own.The only two things I didn't quite like were the bevel on the screen (makes it impossible to have a screen protector that covers all of the glass) and the plastic back cover (it is too thin and light, after a year and a half of having my phone, it has tons of scratches and even a big dent).

Reviews.Title: :-)  Samsung Gslaxy3
Reviews.Author: michelle85251
Reviews.Content: This is an unlocked phone, which required a little additional work.  I watched several you tube videos,  and asked friends and family.  It's worth it though.  Love it.  Like the bigger screen.  like the extra features although I've had many in my previous LG.  I use my phone a Lot while doing volunteer work.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: SLeven
Reviews.Content: the Galaxy s3 is widely known for its specs so i wont reiterate them here i would just say the item came as described and works well no complains thus far

Reviews.Title: Excelletn equipment
Reviews.Author: Pedro S.
Reviews.Content: Excellent, with the last tecnology in this devices. The best equipment I have ever, I can use as computer, celphone and video game.Is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: It came all in French
Reviews.Author: Renato Verdegay
Reviews.Content: The phone is superb. However it came all in French. I share the same perspectives of other guys who commented earlier about the seal and the other language content! The description should tell about it!

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy s3
Reviews.Author: lgtrix
Reviews.Content: This was the best phone that i ever had. it looks like cool, it is fast, easy to use, and the most important thing, it is best than iphone.

Reviews.Title: 16 GB de Samsung GT-I9300 Galaxy S III Celular - Teléfono desbloqueado - No. ..
Reviews.Author: ender rodriguez
Reviews.Content: gratamente complacido con la entrga del producto, llego en el tiempo justo y es de muy buena calidad, se adapto muy bien a mi gusto y muy satisfecho con el vendedor. demas esta decir que se cumplieron todas mis expectativas

Reviews.Title: sim card size for us and for international?
Reviews.Author: P. Canales
Reviews.Content: Can you let me know the type of SIM card this model must use? the standard or the small size?

Reviews.Title: tricked me!!
Reviews.Author: Hely G. Martinez Montiel
Reviews.Content: I am very deseccionado! the team that came is not what I bought, a used equipment, has bumps and scratches, and the phone came to Venezuela and was emviado from Miami United States RudyExport wing opened when received it and I found that surprising, I want to repay the money and who takes action and of course return this team they sent me!!

Android OS v4.0.4; Super AMOLED 4.8 touchscreen; Corning Gorilla Glass 2; Touchwiz UI v4.0
16GB internal memory, microSD up to 64GB;  Bluetooth v4.0
8MP camera, autofocus, LED Flash, Simultaneous HD video and image recording, geo-tagging, touch focus, smile detection; 1080p@30fps. 1.9MP secondary camera 720p@30fps
Wi-Fi; A-GPS support, GLONASS
Stereo FM Radio, MP3/MP4; S-Voice natural language commands and dictation, Smart Stay eye tracker, Dropbox, Document editor; Image/Video editor
